attributes.action: introduce a two-tier minimum wage to help people get on the employment ladder.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Too many people (even graduates, due to the massive increase in university attendance since 1997) are denied jobs due to the "no job without experience, no experience without a job" catch-22.

I suggest that the minimum wage should be increased to £8 per hour for any job which requires previous experience, and cut to £4 per hour for jobs not requiring experience, thus encouraging employers to set on people looking for their first job.
